item.description:
Millions of North Americans are searching for an opportunity; an opportunity to change their lives.

Some are looking for time and money...

Some are looking to make a difference...

Some are looking for freedom.


Thousands of people just like you have found it with Pre-Paid Legal.

Pre-Paid Legal is a New York Stock Exchange company with over 35 years of experience. The company currently provides legal services and identity theft protection to well over one million families across North America through pre-paid legal plans.

Timing is Everything - History shows that when an industry hits a 2% market penetration, critical mass can be achieved. Pre-Paid legal is currently at approximately 2/10ths of 1% market penetration.

Come to a V.I.P Open House and find out if PrePaid Legal is for you.
Here is what you will learn:

Why legal protection?
How does this business work?
How can I make money with this opportunity?
What does it cost to start?
What does a legal service plan cover?
What does a legal service plan cost?
Identity Theft Shield
And more
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby. If you don't see me, ask for me at the front desk.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Are you looking for an additional source of income?
